title: Renting Accommodation & Housing for International Students in Iran
introduction: One of the main concerns for international students after receiving university admission is finding suitable accommodation in Iran. We provide comprehensive rental and housing services to help students secure a safe and comfortable place to stay before they arrive in Iran.

accommodationTypes.title: Types of Accommodation Available
accommodationTypes.type1-desc: Affordable, university-provided accommodation with essential facilities.
accommodationTypes.type2-desc: Ideal for students who prefer privacy and independence.
accommodationTypes.type3-desc: A budget-friendly option where students can share living spaces.
accommodationTypes.type4-desc: Short-term stays for students who need temporary housing before settling.

howItWorks.title: How to Use Our Housing Services?
howItWorks.step1-desc: Based on your budget and needs, we help you select the best housing option.
howItWorks.step2-desc: We provide detailed listings with descriptions, pictures, and prices to help you make an informed decision.
howItWorks.step3-desc: Our team assists with lease agreements, deposits, and other necessary paperwork.
howItWorks.step4-desc: Upon arrival, our team helps you settle into your accommodation smoothly.

whyUs.title: Why Choose Our Housing Services?
whyUs.point2-desc: From property selection to contract signing.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Can I reserve accommodation before arriving in Iran?
faq.a1: Yes, we offer pre-arrival booking services to ensure a hassle-free transition.
faq.q2: Can I change my accommodation after moving in?
faq.a2: Yes, you can switch to a different housing option with prior coordination.
faq.q3: How much does renting an apartment or dormitory cost?
faq.a3: Costs vary based on location, type, and facilities. Contact us for updated pricing.
faq.a4: Yes, we offer temporary housing options, such as furnished apartments and hotel stays.

contact.title: Book Your Accommodation Now!
contact.description: If you are looking for a safe and comfortable place to stay in Iran, we are here to assist you. Contact us today to explore available options!
